channel.title: React on 技術の手帳
channel.description: Recent content in React on 技術の手帳

item.title: React17 + ReactHook + TS4 仿Jira项目---学习笔记（一）
item.description: 第一章 知识点一： 用 create-react-app 初始化项目： 1. Quick Start npx create-react-app react-jira --template typescript # or npm init react-app react-jira # or yarn create react-app react-jira npx create-react-app my-app --use-npm # if you prefer to use npm 2. Folder Structure For faster rebuilds, only files inside src are processed by webpack. You need to put any JS and CSS files inside src, otherwise webpack won’t see them. 字体，图片等也同样应置于 scr 目录中
